about_the_game:
Ling Notes - The Dream of Xiao Mu Midsummer (with 29999 Ling Coin) DLC contains the Dream Dream costume of Xiao Mu Midsummer, with 29999 Ling Coin attached to DLC.
Sheng Ge is boiling all over the South Lake. Tonight, he will go back to painting.
Lake blue beach trousers with fine leaf pattern, reveal the body and grandeur of the Queen Wu!
On the boundless sea, there are many happy sprays dancing gracefully and lightly. Leaping into the blue water and feeling the refreshing and pleasant temperature, this is the dream of midsummer night!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
